data.persona: I am better and smarter than a raven. I see more than he. I know so much.
data.description:
You are in the The witches cottage.
The witches cottage has a huge cauldron in the middle of the cottage. There are shelves of glass jars that have things like spider legs, dragon toe nails, and fairy wings.  The floor is a dirt floor and the roof is made of wooden brooms.
There's a jar, a leg, a wing, a Dragon toe nail, and a cauldron here.
The witch and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to have the spyglass
data.mid_motivation: I want to spot prey from afar off
data.long_motivation: I want to prove that I am a better hunter than the raven
